text: Abel nɨghnɨzir gavgavim Godɨn ikia, egha bizir kam bagha God bagha ofa gami. An ofa Godɨn damazim bar deragha, egha Kenɨn ofa gafira. Abel nɨghnɨzir gavgavim Godɨn iti, ezɨ bizir kam bagha God Abelɨn bizir aghuir an a ganɨdim bagha ifonge. Ezɨ bizir kam kamaghɨn en aka, God a mɨgɨa ghaze, a gumazir aghuim. Abel an aremegha gɨfa. Ezɨ an nɨghnɨzir gavgavir kamɨn a datɨrɨghɨn akamɨn gun e mɨgɨavɨra iti.
